de.ralleytn.wrapper.microsoft.xinput

Class XInputBatteryInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.jna.Structure
      • de.ralleytn.wrapper.microsoft.xinput.XInputBatteryInformation

  • public final class XInputBatteryInformation
extends com.sun.jna.Structure
    Contains information on battery type and charge state.

    Requirements

    Source: Microsoft Documentation

    • Field Detail

      • BatteryType

        public byte BatteryType

        The type of battery. BatteryType will be one of the following values.

        ValueDescription
        XInput.BATTERY_TYPE_DISCONNECTED}The device is not connected.
        XInput.BATTERY_TYPE_WIRED}The device is a wired device and does not have a battery.
        XInput.BATTERY_TYPE_ALKALINE}The device has an alkaline battery.
        XInput.BATTERY_TYPE_NIMH}The device has a nickel metal hydride battery.
        XInput.BATTERY_TYPE_UNKNOWN}The device has an unknown battery type.

        Source: Microsoft Documentation

        Since:
        1.0.0

      • BatteryLevel

        public byte BatteryLevel

        The charge state of the battery. This value is only valid for wireless devices with a known battery type. BatteryLevel will be one of the following values.

        • XInput.BATTERY_LEVEL_EMPTY
        • XInput.BATTERY_LEVEL_LOW
        • XInput.BATTERY_LEVEL_MEDIUM
        • XInput.BATTERY_LEVEL_FULL

        Source: Microsoft Documentation

        Since:
        1.0.0

      • XInputBatteryInformation

        public XInputBatteryInformation()
